__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Aqueduct
data.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.
data.descriptionCN: 石砌基础设施可以连接蓄水池之间的水，从而提高所有相连蓄水池的水位。可以与石墙相连接。

data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产远程步兵单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Barracks
data.description: Produces melee infantry units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产近战步兵单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.
data.descriptionCN: 可研究强化步兵和骑兵的科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
data.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
data.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Cistern
data.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura.
data.descriptionCN:
根据网络等级，附近村民的采集速率 +10/14/18/22/26%。产生影响力，提升生产、研究或防御。可激活阿克里人防御，使附近村民快速武装起来。
将蓄水池连接到水渠，可强化它们的影响力和村民采集速率光环。

data.name: Cistern of the First Hill
data.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.
data.descriptionCN:
可作为蓄水池使用。解锁朝圣者之瓶能力，用于非攻城类军事单位，激活后每秒恢复的生命值增加 25，持续 6 秒。
瓶子每 30 秒充能一次，最多充能至 20 次。

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.
data.descriptionCN:
生产海军单位。
自动修理附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳三艘渔船。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Foreign Engineering Company
data.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Huihui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.
data.descriptionCN: 允许用橄榄油生产一窝蜂、回回炮和皇家加农炮。雇佣兵会从其原来的文明中获得各种独特的科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Golden Horn Tower
data.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.
data.descriptionCN: 定期免费生产已解锁的雇佣兵单位。

data.name: Grand Winery
data.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.
data.descriptionCN: 可作为磨坊和修道院使用。附近的村民从浆果丛和橄榄树林中采集的橄榄油 +60%。保管的圣物产生橄榄油而不是黄金。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: House
data.description: Increases your maximum Population. Contains the unique Border Settlements technology.
data.descriptionCN: 提升人口上限。包含独特的边境聚落科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Imperial Hippodrome
data.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 25 seconds. Earn more points by defeating enemy units.
data.descriptionCN:
可作为马厩使用。具备凯旋能力，可使用补给点激活，以增加骑兵近战伤害、移动速度和生命值恢复效果。
自带 10 个补给点，并且每 25 秒产生一个。击败敌方单位可获取更多点数。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Keep
data.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
data.descriptionCN: 坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Lumber Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将木材存放于这座建筑。可研究提升木材采集效率的科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Market
data.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader. Byzantine Traders generate +20% Olive Oil on successful trades.
data.descriptionCN: 可买卖资源及生产商人。拜占庭商人在成功交易时产生的橄榄油 +20%。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Mercenary House
data.description:
Produces Mercenary units for Olive Oil after purchasing a Mercenary Contract. One contract can be purchased.
Unlock another set of Mercenaries with +50% production speed by placing this building near a Trade Post.
data.descriptionCN:
购买了雇佣合同后，可生产采集橄榄油的雇佣兵单位。每个玩家只能购买一份合同。
此外，将该建筑物放置在贸易站附近，还可以解锁另一组雇佣兵，使其生产速度提高 +50%。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Mill
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering. Byzantine Villagers generate Olive Oil equal to 50% of Food from Berry Bushes, 10% from Fish, and 20% from Olive Groves.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将食物存放于这座建筑内。可研究提升食物采集效率的科技。拜占庭村民产生的橄榄油相当于从浆果丛采集的 50% 食物，捕鱼时采集的 10% 食物，以及从橄榄树林采集的 20% 食物。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Mining Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将石料和黄金存放于这座建筑。可研究提升采矿效率的科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Monastery
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
data.descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Olive Grove
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Olive Grove.
Only one Villager can work each Olive Grove.
Byzantine Villagers gather Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered.
data.descriptionCN:
可收获的食物来源。用一名村民从橄榄树林采集食物。
每个橄榄树林只能有一名村民工作。
拜占庭的村民能采集橄榄油，采集的数量相当于食物采集的 20%。

data.name: Outpost
data.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
data.descriptionCN: 可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Palatine School
data.description: When training Limitanei, Varangian Guards, Cataphracts, or Cheirosiphons there is a 30% chance to also spawn one at this Landmark.
data.descriptionCN: 在训练边防军、瓦兰吉卫队、甲胄骑兵或基耶罗喷火筒时，有 30% 的几率在此地标也生成一个相同单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Palisade
data.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.
data.descriptionCN:
轻型的防御城墙，可快速为区域设防。
最初花费 21 木材，每增加一段则花费 7 木材。

data.name: Palisade Gate
data.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.
data.descriptionCN: 轻型防御城门。必须建造在木栅栏上。

data.name: Siege Workshop
data.description: Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产攻城器械和强大的火药单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Stable
data.description: Produces cavalry military units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产骑兵军事单位。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.
data.descriptionCN:
坚固的城墙，火把无法攻击。
城墙上的单位受到远程攻击的伤害 -25%，攻城攻击的伤害 -50%，并且它们的射程 +1。

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.
data.descriptionCN:
重型防御城门。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用城门前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a mangonel. Must be built on a Stone Wall. 
Can be used to access the top of walls.
data.descriptionCN:
防御坚实的箭塔，可发射轻型投石车。必须建于石墙上。
可利用箭塔前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
data.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: University
data.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.
data.descriptionCN: 可研究对整个文明有益的先进科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
